channel.title: When a new player logs into my server this is what happens
channel.description:
Recently this just started happening when I logged into a new account on my server:
[IMG]http://i644.photobucket.com/albums/uu162/OmfqScape/Whydoesthishappen-1.png[/img]
The name was 'New' then when I typed something in it automatically made my name 'Invalid Name'...
Can any one help?
- Omfq

item.title: When a new player logs into my server this is what happens
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Use bluurrs client. or just replace old delta player.java nd put it in ur source…

Read full topic
item.source: When a new player logs into my server this is what happens

item.title: When a new player logs into my server this is what happens
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

Go get the player.java from the original source. (czar or delta or w.e )

Read full topic

item.title: When a new player logs into my server this is what happens
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“9d n 1 n e, post:4, topic:283634”][quote author=Denoria link=topic=374846.msg2825639#msg2825639 date=1244958933]
Yes, Client sided it’s because that client that’s in the picture hasn’t got proper weilding coded, I’m guessing, Try downloading and editing a new client
[/quote]
fail. server side idiot. as bluurrs tut to use his client with a base, remove the edits in player.java with the skulling, ect.[/quote]Why am i an idiot…god kids…

Read full topic
item.source: When a new player logs into my server this is what happens

item.title: When a new player logs into my server this is what happens
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

[quote=“9d n 1 n e, post:4, topic:283634”][quote author=Denoria link=topic=374846.msg2825639#msg2825639 date=1244958933]
Yes, Client sided it’s because that client that’s in the picture hasn’t got proper weilding coded, I’m guessing, Try downloading and editing a new client
[/quote]
fail. server side idiot. as bluurrs tut to use his client with a base, remove the edits in player.java with the skulling, ect.[/quote]Well then you can do the honors of giving him the correct information, he’s using a 317 source looks like repeagescape. Obviously he can fix it server-sided although he can also fix it with a way that is more simple which i explained above.

Read full topic
